item.title: Erin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Erin add a quote by Kahil Gibran
item.description: "Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need." -- Kahil Gibran

item.title: Erin add a quote by Candace Bushnell
item.description: "The universe may not always play fair, but at least it's got a hell of a sense of humor." -- Candace Bushnell

item.title: Erin add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "Books may well be the only true magic." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Erin add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "Your memory is a monster; you forget—it doesn't. It simply files things away. It keeps things for you, or hides things from you—and summons them to your recall with will of its own. You think you have a memory; but it has you!" -- John Irving

item.title: Erin add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "A photo says, you were happy, and I wanted to catch that. A photo says, you were so important to me that I put down everything else to come watch." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Erin add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Erin add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I declare after all there is no enjoyment like reading! How much sooner one tires of any thing than of a book! -- When I have a house of my own, I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent library." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Erin add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "When I was a child, adults would tell me not to make things up, warning me of what would happen if I did. As far as I can tell so far, it seems to involve lots of foreign travel and not having to get up too early in the morning." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Erin add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "People think dreams aren't real just because they aren't made of matter, of particles. Dreams are real. But they are made of viewpoints, of images, of memories and puns and lost hopes." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Erin add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I never had any friends later on like the ones I had when I was 12 - Jesus, did you?" -- Stephen King

item.title: Erin add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks
